content.question: The image of Bernini’s statue functions throughout the passage as a motif that

choices.label: presents a powerful example of religious faith
juxtaposes the realms of the spirit with the realms of the flesh
contrasts the worlds of art and medical science

content.answer: juxtaposes the realms of the spirit with the realms of the flesh

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
